While our PRESIDENT isn't perfect, we are way ahead of the incompetent President that last ran our country. One brought us back, the other really actually tried to destroy us and never was treated the way PRESIDENT Obama has been treated. Disgraceful, all of you!!

Probably the money that they saved from payroll by refusing to pay their workers a living wage... so that in addition to working they are still poor enough to qualify for public assistance... the result being that the rest of us taxpayers get to subsidize Wal-Mart's payroll . They also save money by refusing to have a large enough staff on duty to watch the floor and deter shoplifting... Meaning that in some cities as many as two officers pretty much spend their days dealing with crimes at Walmart... and the taxpayers pay for those police officers... Meaning that once again we are subsidizing Walmart's cost of doing business. Also... They save money by opening up all those self-serve registers so that they have fewer jobs to offer real people.

I love how any counter to Nancy's claims are """"hateful"""" or """"negative"""". She posts a couple of anecdotal items she believes Trump is """"fixing"""", Kim responds with details and questions and it's """"negative"""" and """"hateful"""" and she isn't discussing """"facts"""". And yet anyone who doesn't support or believe a word Trump says has filters over THEIR ears. That's some serious cognitive dissonance and projection, Nancy. Just because you enjoy being gaslit doesn't mean the rest of us are too stupid to realize what's happening.
An articulate voice of reason! How refreshing!
